org.apache.avro.specific

Class SpecificDatumReader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumReader<T>
      • org.apache.avro.specific.SpecificDatumReader<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatumReader<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReflectDatumReader

    public class SpecificDatumReader<T>
extends GenericDatumReader<T>
    DatumReader for generated Java classes.

      • findStringClass

        protected Class findStringClass(Schema schema)
        Description copied from class: GenericDatumReader
        Determines the class to used to represent a string Schema. By default uses GenericData.STRING_PROP to determine whether Utf8 or String is used. Subclasses may override for alternate representations.
        Overrides:
        findStringClass in class GenericDatumReader<T>
